name: Following Step
text: You can repeatedly close the distance when foes try to move away, without impeding your normal movement.
benefit: When using the Step Up feat to follow an adjacent foe, you may move up to 10 feet. You may still take a 5-foot step during your next turn, and any movement you make using this feat does not subtract any distance from your movement during your next turn.
normal: You can only take a 5-foot step to follow an opponent using Step Up.
staminaText: When you use this feat to move, you can spend 2 stamina points to increase your movement to 15 feet.
text_zh: 当敌人试图从你身边逃开时，你能够反覆尝试跟上他而不会妨碍自身的正常移动。
benefit_zh: 当你使用“快步跟进”专长跟上邻近的敌人时，你能够移动至多10尺。你可以在下一轮内使用五尺快步，并且任何使用此专长进行的移动，均不会扣除你下一轮的移动距离。
normal_zh: 你只能使用“快步跟进”专长进行五尺快步跟上敌人。
staminaText_zh: 当你使用这个专长来进行移动时，你可以消耗2点耐力来提升你的移动力至15尺。
